scripts.global: echo '=> Installing Global Modules' && npm install -g --save-dev bower pm2 mocha standard istanbul markdown-html good-mocha-html-reporter raml2html jsdoc less jade html-minifier uglify-js uglifycss imagemin-cli
scripts.test: echo '=> Testing [[seed:projectName]]' && istanbul cover _mocha -- tests/* -R good-mocha-html-reporter
scripts.copy: echo '=> Copy Assets for [[seed:projectName]]' && npm run copy:folders && npm run copy:css && npm run copy:js && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:bower
scripts.copy:folders: npm run copy:folders:create && npm run copy:folders:clean
scripts.copy:folders:create: mkdir -p tmp/css && mkdir -p tmp/js && mkdir -p tmp/html && mkdir -p tmp/images && mkdir -p public/js && mkdir -p public/html && mkdir -p public/css  && mkdir -p public/images && mkdir -p public/fonts
scripts.copy:folders:clean: rm -rf tmp/css/* && rm -rf tmp/js && rm -rf tmp/html && rm -rf tmp/images && rm -rf public/js && rm -rf public/html && rm -rf public/css  && rm -rf public/images && rm -rf public/fonts
scripts.copy:css: cp assets/css/*.css tmp/css/* && lessc assets/main.less tmp/css/main.css
scripts.copy:html: jade assets/html/index.jade -o tmp/html/index.html && jade assets/html/index-debug.jade -o tmp/html/index-debug.html && jade assets/html/templates/*.jade -o tmp/html/
scripts.copy:bower: npm run copy:bower:bootstrap && npm run copy:bower:angular && npm run copy:bower:jquery && npm run copy:bower:font-awesome
scripts.minify: npm run minifiy:html && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:images
scripts.doc: echo '=> Gathering Docs for [[seed:projectName]]' && npm run doc:istanbul && npm run doc:markdown && npm run doc:mocha && npm run doc:raml && npm run doc:jsdoc
scripts.doc:markdown: markdown-html docs/index.md -o docs/index.html && markdown-html README.md -o docs/readme.html && markdown-html seed.md -o docs/seed.html
scripts.deploy: echo '=> Deploying [[seed:projectName]]' && npm run global && npm install && bower install && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run copy && npm run minify && npm run doc && npm run start
scripts.debug: echo '=> Starting [[seed:projectName]] in DEBUG MODE' && npm run debug:copy && npm run debug:start
scripts.debug:copy: npm run copy && cp -r tmp/* public/*
